value.string:
<tal:block replace="nothing"
 xmlns:tal="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/tal"
 xmlns:metal="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/metal"
 xmlns:i18n="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/i18n"/>
 
 <tal:block define="dummy python: request.RESPONSE.setHeader('Content-Type', 'text/css;; charset=utf-8')"/>
 
 /*========================================================================================
 WebSite_viewWorkspaceWidget CSS.
 
 ========================================================================================*/
 
 .submission_wizard{
 background: #BBB;
 padding: 3px;
 }
 
 .submission_wizard .actions{
 font-size: 1.5em;
 height: 1.5em;
 padding-top : 0.8em;
 padding-bottom : 0.8em;
 }
 
 .submission_wizard .actions ul{
 margin-left: 10px;
 }
 
 .submission_wizard .actions li{
 display: inline;
 margin-left:0;
 }
 
 .submission_wizard .actions img{
 margin:0;
 vertical-align:middle; 
 }
 
 .submission_wizard .actions li .current,
 .submission_wizard .actions li .disable,
 .submission_wizard .actions li .enable{
 padding: 5px;
 border: 1px solid black;
 }
 
 .submission_wizard .actions li .current{
 font-weight: bold;
 border: 2px solid red;
 }
 
 .submission_wizard .actions li .current,
 .submission_wizard .actions li .enable{
 background: #00FF00;
 }
 
 .submission_wizard .actions li .disable{
 background: #DDF;
 }
 
 .submission_wizard .actions li .enable,
 .submission_wizard .actions li .disable{
 text-decoration: underline;
 }
 
 .submission_wizard .wizard_title{
 padding-top: 2px;
 margin-bottom: 0.5em;
 color:white;
 font-size:2em;
 font-weight:bold;
 }
 
 .submission_wizard .wizard_explanations{
 padding-bottom: 2px;
 color:white;
 font-size:1.1em;
 }
 
 .submission_wizard .fleche{
 margin: 0 3px 0 3px;
 }
